attributes.action: Provide decent I.T funding for the unemployed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been out of work for 6 months.  I have a HND in Electronics.  The only I.T course suitable for me is a CISCO course that is privately funded and costs £3,000 - the DHSS won't help with cost and I don't have the money.  If we were helped with funding we could pay back the cost when we got a good job.
